hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: BUILD_PERL_VERSION
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The version of Perl to build

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: PERL_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the Perl source tarball file

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ## DOWNLOAD if [ ! -e $SOURCE_DIR/$PERL_TARBALL ]; then if [ ! -d $SOURCE_DIR ]; then mkdir $SOURCE_DIR fi # download the perl tarball, save the logs from wget wget -O $SOURCE_DIR/$PERL_TARBALL \ -o $WORKSPACE/wget.log \ http://www.cpan.org/src/5.0/$PERL_TARBALL else echo "Perl already exists in ${SOURCE_DIR}" fi

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION} fi
tar -zxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$PERL_TARBALL
cd perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" # -de = use defaults, go on without questions # there's a test in Configure for which file descriptor is connected # to Configure, the wrong file descriptor exits Configure sh Configure -de \ -Dprefix="${WORKSPACE}/perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION}-bin" \ -Dusethreads -Duserelocatableinc
## BUILD AND TEST cd perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## ARCHIVE AND DELETE BUILD DIR # -J == xz compression tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION}.artifact.tar.xz \ $WORKSPACE/perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION}-bin # remove the old install directory rm -rf $WORKSPACE/perl-${BUILD_PERL_VERSION}-bin
